description: In 2016, Ono created Skylanding, a monumental 12-petal lotus sculpture for Chicago's Jackson Park, where the Phoenix Pavilion—Japan’s contribution to the 1893 World’s Columbian Exposition—had stood before being destroyed by arson in 1946. Mended Petal is the 13th petal of Ono's sculpture; its repaired break lines reference kintsugi, the Japanese tradition of mending broken porcelain, and the healing of Japanese-American relations over the years.
title: Mended Petal
